title: CFPB Credit Card Complaints Analytics (2019â€“2026)
one_liner: Trend + root-cause analytics on CFPB credit-card complaints to surface drivers of customer friction, dispute patterns, and high-risk issue themes.
impact_bullets: Built complaint KPI layer (volumes, rates, time-to-close, dispute types) with drilldowns by issuer/product, channel, and state.
Performed text analytics on complaint narratives to extract themes (fees, billing disputes, fraud, chargebacks) and quantify emerging risks.
Delivered an executive dashboard + actionable recommendations to reduce complaint recurrence and strengthen compliance monitoring.

title: Auto-EDA & Insights Platform
summary: Interactive analytics platform that converts CSV datasets into structured EDA, data quality diagnostics, visual insights, and executive-ready summaries.

title: Chat with your PDF's (RAG)
summary: A retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) application that allows users to upload PDFs and ask natural language questions, generating grounded answers using vector search and the Gemini API.
